parameters.name: SettingName
parameters.description:
The setting name of the associated resource tag rule.

For specific values, see the **Rule Setting Name** column in [Resources that Support Associated Resource Tag Settings](~~2586330~~).

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Indicates whether to enable the associated resource tag rule. Values:

- Enable: Enabled.
- Disable: Disabled.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: List of tag keys affected by the associated resource tag rule.
